Initializer# init(duration:presentationTimeStamp:decodeTimeStamp:)

iOS 4.0+iPadOS 4.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
init(
    duration: CMTime,
    presentationTimeStamp: CMTime,
    decodeTimeStamp: CMTime
)
```
